item.title: tracestar Concept
item.description: Abstracts Revisiting A*, its seems there are not that many interactive experience that can immerse knowledge seeker into the algorithm. Game is a great device for this. In this spirit, the lab decided to concept tracestar, a casual game with the main goal of letting the user experience A*. Introduction A* is a path finding algorithm optimized to find shortest and cheapest path between two points. The algorithm is a generalized case of Dijkstra’s path finding algorithm, using a heuristic, or an estimated guess as to how far away a node is from the goal.
